mapper.sql: id, bill_master_id, order_receivable_id, cost_code, cost_name, amount, cid, remarks
mapper.select: select t.id,t.bill_master_id,t.order_receivable_id,t.cost_code,t.cost_name,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks, t1.currency_code,t1.currency_name, concat(t.amount,' ',t1.currency_name) bill_amount, concat(t.amount,' ',t1.currency_name) balance_amount from receivable_bill_detail t left join currency_info t1 on t1.id = t.cid where 1=1 and t.bill_master_id = #{billMasterId}

select t.id, t.amount,t.cost_name,t.remarks, t1.count,t1.unit_price, DATE_FORMAT(t2.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time,t2.order_no,t2.total_cartons, t3.country_name, t6.code_name serviceType from receivable_bill_detail t left join order_cope_receivable t1 on t1.id = t.order_receivable_id left join order_info t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id left join fab_warehouse t3 on t3.warehouse_code = t2.destination_warehouse_code left join offer_info t4 on t4.id = t2.offer_info_id left join quotation_template t5 on t5.id = t4.qie left join service_group t6 on t6.id = t5.sid where 1=1 and t.bill_master_id = #{billMasterId}
